trans-unit.source: Please select the type of page content you wish to create:
trans-unit.target: Please select the type of page content you wish to create:

trans-unit.source: Now, click the position where you wish to place the element on the page:
trans-unit.target: Now, click the position where you wish to place the element on the page:

trans-unit.source: A regular text element with header and bodytext fields.
trans-unit.target: A regular text element with header and bodytext fields.

trans-unit.source: Any number of images wrapped right around a regular text element.
trans-unit.target: Any number of images wrapped right around a regular text element.

trans-unit.source: Any number of images aligned in columns and rows with a caption.
trans-unit.target: Any number of images aligned in columns and rows with a caption.

trans-unit.source: Makes a list of files for download.
trans-unit.target: Makes a list of files for download.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a media element like a Flash animation, audio file or video clip.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a media element like a Flash animation, audio file or video clip.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a media element like a Flash animation, audio file or video clip.
trans-unit.target: Inserts a media element like a Flash animation, audio file or video clip.

trans-unit.source: Inserts Flash media element, audio file or video clip.
trans-unit.target: Inserts Flash media element, audio file or video clip.

trans-unit.source: Inserts a Quicktime element like a Quicktime audio file or video clip (*.mov).
trans-unit.target: Inserts a Quicktime element like a Quicktime audio file or video clip (*.mov).

trans-unit.source: Creates a sitemap of the website.
trans-unit.target: Creates a sitemap of the website.

trans-unit.source: With this element you can insert raw HTML code on the page.
trans-unit.target: With this element you can insert raw HTML code on the page.

trans-unit.source: This element inserts a visual divider, which is by default a horizontal line.
trans-unit.target: This element inserts a visual divider, which is by default a horizontal line.

trans-unit.source: A mail form allowing website users to submit responses.
trans-unit.target: A mail form allowing website users to submit responses.

trans-unit.source: Draws a search form and the searchresult if a search is performed.
trans-unit.target: Draws a search form and the searchresult if a search is performed.

trans-unit.source: Login/logout form used to password protect pages allowing only authorised website users and groups access.
trans-unit.target: Login/logout form used to password protect pages allowing only authorised website users and groups access.

trans-unit.source: Select this element type to insert a plugin which cannot be found amongst the options below.
trans-unit.target: Select this element type to insert a plugin which cannot be found amongst the options below.
